item.description: Fourth Annual Family Camp. guest instructor's at this year's camp include Dr. Michael Coffman, Tom Eddlem, Jim Perloff, Rev Steve Craft and The Patriot Pastor Garrett Lear. Also, local historian Tom Moor, Committees of Safety Director Dan McGonigle and author Sally Hum...phries. Field trips to the Louisa May Alcott Home and Concord Bridge and a hike up Mt. Monadnock, community outreach. Recreational activities include swimming, baskedball, voleyball, wiffleball, indoor rock climbing, chess tournaments. The camp has an evening campfire, camp newspaper. For prices, tuition help or donations, visit www.campconstitution.net
item.name: Camp Constitution's Annual Family Camp
